row.entry: A string containing the data to search.
A string containing the substring to search for.
A string containing the replacement data.
A null-terminated string containing the language and country code to use to determine correct sort order and other operations.
FindReplace returns a STRING or UNICODE value, as appropriate.

sect1.para: The FindReplace functions return the source string with the replacement string substituted for all instances of the target string . If the target string is not in the source string, it returns the source string unaltered.
